com.projetloki.genesis.image

Class Border

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.projetloki.genesis.image.Border
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class Border
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A border around the edge of a shape. Borders are immutable.
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Roux
    See Also:
    Image.mask(Shape, Border[]), Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Border(double width, Color color)
      Creates a fully opaque border with the specified width and color.
      Border(double width, Color color, double alpha)
      Creates a border with the specified width, color and opacity.

        width - the width of the border. Must be positive.
        color - the color of the border

      • Border

        public Border(double width,
      Color color,
      double alpha)
        Creates a border with the specified width, color and opacity.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the border. Must be positive.
        color - the color of the border
        alpha - the opacity of the border. Must be between 0 and 1.
